name: @agyemanjp/fxui
description: Functional, declarative, component-based UI library that supports JSX and Typescript

scripts.compile: tsc --outDir tmp && mkdir -p dist && cp -r tmp/source/* dist && rm -rf tmp
scripts.publish:preview: bun publish:stage && cd dist && bun publish --dry-run && cd ..
scripts.publish:patch: run-s clean compile ver:patch publish:stage && cd dist && bun publish --access public && cd ..
scripts.publish:minor: run-s clean compile ver:minor publish:stage && cd dist && bun publish --access public && cd ..
scripts.publish:major: run-s clean compile ver:major publish:stage && cd dist && bun publish --access public && cd ..
